title: Find the acceleration of a particle from velocity

content.question: A particle moves along the x-axis so that at any time t â‰¥ 0 its velocity is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E4@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. What is the acceleration of the particle at time t = 6?
